originalText.text:
Ozan and his team did a phenomenal job with my built-in cabinetry in the living room. From the moment Ozan came in for the initial consultation to the day of the installation, he was professional, responsive, and flexible.

I had some ideas for the design that I shared with Ozan. He took my ideas and elevated them to produce an end result that surpassed my expectations. Everything was done with care and a focus on detail, on a timeline that we agreed upon at the beginning of the project. I could not recommend Ozan and his team more and look forward to working on more projects in the future.

originalText.text: It was a pleasure to have Ozan of Ozancraft create our beautiful new bookshelves and combination radiator and air conditioner covers. He is a perfectionist and worked with us very carefully to make sure our new stereo components would fit properly in our bookshelves while designing in them in the style we liked. He also designed the combination radiator and air conditioners for optimum air flow. We are so happy with everything and feel that all the units have added greatly to the value of our apartment!

text.text: It was a pleasure to have Ozan of Ozancraft create our beautiful new bookshelves and combination radiator and air conditioner covers. originalText.text:
We needed a custom built-in entertainment unit/book case and had a general idea of what it might look like, but we really needed some help with the design.  Ozan was great to work with.  He showed up at our apartment, listened to what we were thinking of, and them immediately started sketching some plans out on paper as well as in the design software on his computer.  He made practical suggestions about functionality as well as some suggestions about the aesthetics.
Within a short time period he sent over designs for review and happily made a few revisions we wanted.  Once the mill work was completed he came back and did the install.  It looks great and we are impressed with the quality, the appearance and the construction. We would definitely work with Ozan again.

text.text:

originalText.text:
"A result even better than I had hoped."
I had an idea of a very large series of shelves almost floating along a long wall.  The look was to be very minimal, clean , and modern.
Ozan completely understood what I wanted, and with enormous skill, patience, and precision, translated my ideas into reality.
My new shelves are so beautiful and so incredibly well-made. My building is older and so it was a difficult installation. But Ozan and his team made it look easy.
I am so grateful for his professionalism, diligence, good cheer, and responsiveness.
If you need fine cabinet work - OzanCraft is who you want to call.
TW Schaller - NYC

originalText.text: I chose to work with Ozan of OzanCraft after seeing the work he did. And after working with him I can truly say that I made the best choice possible. I told him what I was thinking about and what I had wanted, showed him examples and very rough ideas, and he gave me some ideas and recommendations. From that, he built the most magnificent built-in wall unit I could have imagined. Above and beyond anything I was even thinking about. I love going to upscale model homes and design centers and I've never even seen anything that comes close to this. Not only is his design superior to anything I've ever seen, he was so easy and friendly to work with. And neat! I didn't have to clean up anything after he installed this piece. It was unbelievable! I would recommend Ozan to anyone who is looking to enhance their home and make it a usable showplace.
